Plot: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing.
Title: Henry's Crime
Writer: Sacha Gervasi (screenplay), David N. White (screenplay), Stephen Hamel (story), Sacha Gervasi (story)
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Judy Greer, Fisher Stevens, Danny Hoch
tomatoConsensus: Supporting actors Vera Farmiga and James Caan give the movie a little heft, but Henry's Crime is an otherwise predictable heist/comedy with slow pacing.
